document_title: Chronic rhinitis: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
Chronic rhinitis can cause serious complications that affect the patient's long-term health.
Direct or indirect complications may include:
Acute or chronic sinusitis; Purulent otitis media or serous otitis media; Sleep disorders or sleep apnea syndrome; Dental problems; Eustachian tube dysfunction; Nasal polyps; Hearing loss; Abnormal craniofacial development; Makes asthma worse or increases the tendency to develop asthma
